title: Increase BAKE's market value
body:
A. Add stablecoin trading pools similar to curve.fi
Example:
DAI:USDC
USDT:BUSD
50:50

B. Add Balancer-like non-equally weighted trading pools.
This can significantly reduce the risk of impermanent loss for liquidity providers
Example:
USDT:XRP
BUSD:ETH
DAI:BTCB

C. Change the existing transaction handling fee from (0.25%+0.05%) to: 0.1%~0.04%.

D.Transaction fee (0.25% + 0.05%) for all pairs will be submitted to the 100% ongoing repurchase of BAKE.

Reason:
The above changes could significantly increase BAKE's market value
Increasing liquidity provider confidence and positions
Significant increase in daily trading volume

A.建議新增類似curve.fi的穩定幣交易池
例如:
DAI:USDC
USDT:BUSD
50:50

B.請新增類似Balancer的非對等大權重的交易池
這可大幅降低流動性提供者的虧損風險（impermanent loss）
例如:
USDT:XRP
BUSD:ETH
DAI:BTCB
1:99

C.變更現有的交易手續費從(0.25%+0.05%)為:0.1%~0.04%

D.建議將所有交易對的交易手續費(0.25%+0.05%)提交100%不斷回購BAKE

理由:
以上變更可大幅拉升BAKE的市場價值
增加流動性提供者的信心與持倉
大幅提高每日交易量v
author: 0x2755F562e1ca1eFB6eEb5AA026526FA6B635de62
